title: Scotts Bluff National Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Bluffs in Bloom   16 Photos  The wildflowers and plants of Scotts Bluff National Monument.          Wagons   20 Photos  Scotts Bluff National Monument is a great place to learn about pioneer wagons.          Historic Photos   10 Photos  Once Scotts Bluff National Monument was created in 1919, little was done until the 1930s. In 1932, NPS Director Horace Albright verbally approved building a road to the top of the bluff, starting a decade of building and improvements that have survived many years of use and will continue to.            Scenic Photos of Scotts Bluff   6 Photos  Photos of Scotts Bluff National Monument.                    Â        Check out our Flickr account for many more royalty free images. ScottsBluffNPS
